metadata.title: CVE-2018-20836 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.20. There is a racecondition in smp_task_timedout() and smp_task_done() indrivers/scsi/libsas/sas_expander.c, leading to a use-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20836` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-157-generic - 4.4.0-157.185
linux-image-4.4.0-157-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-157.185
